meetTheGang.title: Meet the GANG
meetTheGang.subtitle: The colorful characters behind Elivechit who bring personality and fun to our platform.
meetTheGang.storyPart1: Born from a shared passion for gaming and community, our mascots represent the diverse talents and personalities that make up the Elivechit team.
meetTheGang.storyPart2: Led by Fufu, this dynamic group works together to create the best possible platform for gamers and communities worldwide. Each member brings their unique skills and perspective to the table.
meetTheGang.storyPart3: Whether you're chatting with friends, joining a server, or exploring new communities, the GANG is there to make your experience better.

fufu.name: Fufu
fufu.description: The visionary leader of the GANG, Fufu brings everyone together with strategic thinking and boundless enthusiasm.

kazek.name: Kazek
kazek.description: The brilliant mind behind our technology, Kazek solves complex problems with innovative solutions.

fela.name: Fela
fela.description: With an eye for design and aesthetics, Fela ensures everything looks and feels perfect.

bobby.name: Bobby
bobby.description: The friendly face of our community, Bobby makes sure everyone feels welcome and heard.

footer.description: GANGIO is the ultimate communication platform for gamers. Connect with your friends, build communities, and elevate your gaming experience.

newsletter.title: Stay updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates, features, and news.

wiki.title: Gangio Wiki
wiki.welcomeDesc: Your comprehensive guide to using Gangio and connecting with your communities.

servers.title: Server Guide
servers.shortDesc: Learn to create, join and manage servers for communities.

channels.title: Channel Guide
channels.shortDesc: Discover how to use different channel types for communication.

voice.title: Voice & Video
voice.shortDesc: Use voice and video calls powered by LiveKit technology.

roles.title: Roles & Permissions
roles.shortDesc: Set up roles and permissions to manage your community.

guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.desc: Please follow our community guidelines to ensure a positive experience for everyone.
guidelines.commitment: Gangio is committed to creating safe and inclusive spaces for all users.

moderation.title: Moderation Commands
moderation.shortDesc: Learn about moderation commands and how to use them.

commands.kick: Kick a member from the server
commands.ban: Ban a member from the server
commands.mute: Mute a member for a certain period

settings.title: Settings
settings.notImplemented: This settings panel has not been implemented yet.

displayLanguage.title: Display Language
displayLanguage.autoDetect: Automatically detect language from browser settings
displayLanguage.helpText: This setting changes the language of the user interface. Changes will take effect after reloading the app.

regionalFormat.title: Regional Format
regionalFormat.helpText: These settings determine how dates and times are displayed throughout the app.

textTranslation.title: Text & Translation
textTranslation.thresholdHelp: Higher threshold means translations will only be shown when the system is more confident about their accuracy.

inputDevices.title: Input Devices
inputDevices.permissionRequired: Microphone access is required for audio settings. Please grant permission.

videoSettings.title: Video Settings
videoSettings.permissionRequired: Camera access is required for video settings. Please grant permission.

voiceActivity.title: Voice Activity
voiceActivity.sensitivityHelp: Higher sensitivity means your microphone will activate more easily.

friends.title: Friends
friends.noFriends: No friends found. Add some friends to get started!

hero.title: Elevate Your Gaming Experience
hero.subtitle: The next generation gamer platform designed to connect, communicate and win together with your gaming friends.

features.title: Features Designed for Gamers
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build your gaming community and stay ahead of the competition.

realTimeChat.title: Real-Time Chat
realTimeChat.description: Experience lightning-fast messaging with our cutting-edge real-time communication infrastructure.

serverCommunities.title: Server Communities
serverCommunities.description: Create or join servers, organize channels, and build your community around shared interests.

voiceChannels.title: Crystal-Clear Voice
voiceChannels.description: High-quality, low-latency voice channels for seamless team communication and casual hangouts.

gifSupport.title: Express with GIFs!
gifSupport.description: Bring your chats to life! Easily search, preview, and send GIFs to make conversations more engaging and fun.

gamerFocused.title: Gamer Focused
gamerFocused.description: Built by gamers, for gamers. Our platform is designed to meet the unique needs of the gaming community.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: We take your security and privacy seriously. Our platform is built with robust security measures to protect your data.

voiceChat.title: Crystal Clear Voice Chat
voiceChat.description: Low-latency, high-quality voice communication that keeps you connected with your team during intense gaming sessions.

screenSharing.title: Screen Sharing
screenSharing.description: Share your epic gaming moments, strategies or training with high-quality screen sharing in real time with friends.

community.title: Gaming Communities
community.description: Create and join gaming communities dedicated to your favorite games, find teammates and build lasting friendships.

richText.title: Rich Text Chat
richText.description: Express yourself with rich text formatting, emoji reactions, GIFs and file sharing in our modern chat interface.

gameIntegration.title: Game Integration
gameIntegration.description: Connect your Steam account and show off what you're playing. Automatic game detection and rich presence features.
features: One-click join to your friends' game sessions
Integration with Steam, Epic Games and more

multilanguage.title: Now Multilingual
multilanguage.subtitle: Connect with gamers around the world in their own languages.

community.title: Join Our Growing Community
community.subtitle: Connect with gamers around the world, share gaming tips and make new friends.

customServers.title: Custom Servers
customServers.description: Create custom servers for your community, organize channels and fully personalize your gaming experience.

lowLatency.title: Low Latency
lowLatency.description: Optimized network infrastructure that minimizes lag and provides uninterrupted communication during gameplay.

richPresence.title: Rich Presence
richPresence.description: See what games your friends are playing, how long they've been playing and if they're ready to join.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Support
crossPlatform.description: Stay connected across any device with seamless integration between Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS and Android.

callToAction.title: Ready to Elevate Your Gaming Experience?
callToAction.subtitle: Join thousands of gamers who use our platform to connect, communicate and win together.

translations.title: Help with Translation
translations.subtitle: Join our community effort to make gvng.io accessible to gamers around the world.

notes.structure: Maintain the same JSON structure and keys
notes.keysOnly: Only translate the values, not the keys
notes.test: Test your translations in the app by changing the language

downloadPage.subtitle: Download our app for any platform and stay connected with your gaming communities everywhere.
downloadPage.integrationsTitle: Integrated with Your Favorite Gaming Platforms

windows.requirements: Windows 10 or later, 4GB RAM, 500MB disk space

macos.requirements: macOS 11.0 or later, 4GB RAM, 500MB disk space

linux.requirements: Ubuntu 20.04+, Debian 10+ or other compatible distros

ios.requirements: iOS 14.0 or later, compatible with iPhone, iPad and iPod touch

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Sync

free.question: Is GANGIO free to use?
free.answer: Yes, downloading and using GANGIO is completely free. We offer premium subscriptions with additional features, but core functionality is free forever.

multipleDevices.question: Can I use GANGIO on multiple devices?
multipleDevices.answer: Absolutely! Your account syncs across all platforms so you can switch seamlessly between desktop, mobile and web versions.

security.question: How secure is GANGIO?
security.answer: We use industry-standard encryption and security practices to keep your data safe. Your privacy is our priority.

updates.question: How do I update GANGIO?
updates.answer: The app automatically checks for updates on startup. You can also manually check for updates in the settings menu.

login.subtitle: Sign in to gvng.io and connect with your community
login.welcomeMessage: We're so excited to see you again! Sign in to access your communities and pick up where you left off.

account.accountManagementDescription: You can disable or delete your account at any time. This will log you out and completely delete your account including your chat history and friends.
account.disableAccountDescription: You won't be able to access your account unless you contact support - but your data won't be deleted.
account.deleteAccountDescription: Your account and all your data (including your messages and friends list) will be queued for deletion. A confirmation email will be sent - you can cancel this within 7 days by contacting support.
account.userNotFound: User not found. Please sign in again.

members.pleaseLogin: Please sign in to see members.
members.noPermission: You don't have permission to view members of this server.
